title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities. NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Find out what we're doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help!   Our Partners It takes more than an agency to keep this a special place. Park partners play a vital role in helping to preserve the historic and natural resources at Fort Stanwix and share them with the world.  Volunteer at the Park Volunteer at the park in areas from historic interpretation to resource protection.  Work With Us Keep an eye out for year-round and seasonal positions at Fort Stanwix. The park posts all of its paid positions on USAJobs.gov but also posts internship and volunteer opportunities on our website.    Planning The planning process is how the public can express opinions in the management of a national park. Find out if any current opportunities exist to share your voice, or browse past planning documents.   Support Your Park Learn about how you can help support Fort Stanwix. Find volunteer opportunities, how to donate, and more.
